stories.title: Starting Point
stories.content: Early morning start at the trailhead. The air is crisp and the sky is clear. Perfect conditions for the beginning of our adventure.

stories.title: First Peak
stories.content: Reached the first major viewpoint. The climb was challenging but the views are absolutely worth it. Can see the entire valley below.

stories.title: Lunch Break
stories.content: Stopped for lunch at a beautiful alpine meadow. The wildflowers are in full bloom and we can hear birds singing in the distance.

stories.title: Camp Setup
stories.content: Arrived at our campsite for the night. The spot is perfect - flat ground, good water source nearby, and amazing sunset views.
